mapper.select: SELECT u.id , l.poem_id, u.user_id , u.user_nickname,title, content ,p.created_at , like_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment where poem_id = l.poem_id) as comment_cnt FROM poem_like l INNER JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN poem p ON l.poem_id = p.id WHERE l.user_id=#{userId};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM poem_like WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND poem_id = #{poemId};
